description: Leo Forte has training in MMA as well as the Brazilian style of Capoiera. He is brand new to NK and is up against NK veteran, Luke Riley. Luke is currently 1:2 on NK and is determined to even out his record. He is going on raw determination and has a solid plan to abuse Leo's ass, but Leo is just as confident he will be making Luke his little bitch. They both weigh the same and there is just a few inches difference in height, but who will be taking the extra inches in the end? Someone is going to crawl away with a sore ass!
title: Leo Forte vs Luke Riley
